Title: GenericGrid
Description:
GenericGrid is a developer tool to search and page through large database tables.
It is written in ASP.NET, PHP, mySQl & SQL Server, and uses AJAX techniques.
Also uses pseudo modal popup windows to
Edit and Add new records and with auto return grid record selection.
HomeWiki:
GenericGrid


Features
  • Universal paging grid, used as a basic building block for database web applications.
  • Automatic virtual paging grid, reading large databases (millions of records accessed in 2 seconds).
  • ASP.NET and PHP5 versions (running on IIS or Apache)
  • Javascript protection and hidden
  • Update, Add and Delete functions (with auto return grid record selection)
  • AJAX modal popups (Update, Add, Calendar and Progress Bar)
  • Multiple database connection (SQL Server, MySQL and Oracle)
